muclient.script:
function OnPluginPacketReceived (s) --s = string.gsub (s, "...%[0;36m(%d+,%s%d).%[0m...%[3n", "WARP ZONE
[Start_Desc]
This is the Warp Zone!
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[1;31m%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]", "TETRIS ROOM 1
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[1;34m%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]", "TETRIS ROOM 2
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[1;37m%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]%[#%]", "TETRIS ROOM 3
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[1;37m%[!%]%[!%]%[!%]%[!%]", "TETRIS ROOM 4
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[0m[\027]%[0m[\010][\013][\027]", "[Room_Name]
-NO_ROOM_NAME-
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0;36m[\027]%[0m[\010][\013][\027]", "[Room_Name]
-NO_ROOM_NAME-
") --s = string.gsub (s, "^...%[0;36m.%[0m...$", "-NO_ROOM_NAME-
") --s = string.gsub (s, "...%[0;36m(%d+,%s%d).%[0m...%[3n", "14, 6
[Start_Desc]
You are in the Warp Zone.
You can get to various places from here.
Have fun!
") s = string.gsub (s, ".%[0m .%[0m..", "
 [There is no description written for this room]

") s = string.gsub (s, "%[3n", " [Start_Desc]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[0g", " 
[SND_COD_NULL]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[1g", " 
[SND_COD_1UP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[2g", " 
[SND_COD_ATTK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[3g", " 
[SND_COD_BEAM]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[4g", " 
[SND_COD_BLOD]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[5g", " 
[SND_COD_BRCK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[6g", " 
[SND_COD_BUMP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[7g", " 
[SND_COD_BURN]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[8g", " 
[SND_COD_CAST]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[9g", " 
[SND_COD_CHAT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[10g", " 
[SND_COD_CHRG]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[11g", " 
[SND_COD_CNCH]
") --s = string.gsub (s, "%[12g", " 
[SND_COD_COIN]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[13g", " 
[SND_COD_DIE]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[14g", " 
[SND_COD_ENTR]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[15g", " 
[SND_COD_FIND]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[16g", " 
[SND_COD_FLEE]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[17g", " 
[SND_COD_GROW]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[18g", " 
[SND_COD_HEAL]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[19g", " 
[SND_COD_HIT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[20g", " 
[SND_COD_HIT2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[21g", " 
[SND_COD_ICE]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[22g", " 
[SND_COD_JMP2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[23g", " 
[SND_COD_JUMP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[24g", " 
[SND_COD_KICK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[25g", " 
[SND_COD_LASR]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[26g", " 
[SND_COD_LEVL]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[27g", " 
[SND_COD_LOGF]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[28g", " 
[SND_COD_LOGO]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[29g", " 
[SND_COD_MECH]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[30g", " 
[SND_COD_PLNT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[31g", " 
[SND_COD_PWIT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[32g", " 
[SND_COD_RIP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[33g", " 
[SND_COD_SMSH]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[34g", "

") s = string.gsub (s, "%[35g", "

") s = string.gsub (s, "%[37g", "

") s = string.gsub (s, "%[39g", " 
[SND_COD_VICT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[40g", " 
[SND_COD_WARP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[41g", " 
[SND_COD_XPL1]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[42g", " 
[SND_COD_ZAP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[43g", " 
[SND_COD_BLDG]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[44g", " 
[SND_COD_DOG]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[45g", " 
[SND_COD_DOOR]

[SND_COD_TOSS]

") s = string.gsub (s, "%[61g", " 
[SND_COD_WATR]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[62g", " 
[SND_COD_WIN]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[63g", " 
[SND_COD_CHOK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[64g", " 
[SND_COD_SPLS2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[65g", " 
[SND_COD_SLAM2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[66g", " 
[SND_COD_SHLD]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[67g", " 
[SND_COD_SCAN]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[68g", " 
[SND_COD_PAUS]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[69g", " 
[SND_COD_DBUF]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[70g", " 
[SND_COD_MISS]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[71g", " 
[SND_COD_SQEK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[72g", " 
[SND_COD_SUPR]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[73g", " 
[SND_COD_SCRM]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[74g", " 
[SND_COD_BONK]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[75g", " 
[SND_COD_HELI]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[76g", " 
[SND_COD_CHRP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[77g", " 
[SND_COD_SPIT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[78g", " 
[SND_COD_SPIT2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[79g", " 
[SND_COD_PWUP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[80g", " 
[SND_COD_PKUP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[81g", " 
[SND_COD_CRSH]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[82g", " 
[SND_COD_PKUP2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[83g", " 
[SND_COD_ROKT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[84g", " 
[SND_COD_BOMB]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[85g", " 
[SND_COD_RISE]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[86g", " 
[SND_COD_ROAR]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[87g", " 
[SND_COD_BEAM2]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[88g", " 
[SND_COD_RAY]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[89g", " 
[SND_COD_ROLL]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[90g", " 
[SND_COD_BLIP]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[91g", " 
[SND_COD_SCRT]
") s = string.gsub (s, "%[92g", " 
[SND_COD_STAI]
") s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0m[\010][\013]", "
[End_Desc]
")
--s = string.gsub (s, "[\010][\013][\027]%[0m[\091][\048][\109][\010][/013][\027]", "[End_Desc]
") s = string.gsub (s, "Your enhanced resolve fades.", "Spelldown Valor") s = string.gsub (s, "You feel the sinews of your muscles toughen up with resolve.", "Spellup Valor") return s end -- function OnPluginPacketReceived
